title: DND Tabletop "DungeonsAndDragons" "D&D" "Dunegons&Dragons" Generator of the stat block of the villain creature.
original_prompt:
Create a stat block of a villain creature that is compatible with the "Dungeons&Dragons" tabletop game. I need a creature that has mind-controlling abilities or something related to the mind and it must be able to compete on equal chances with 5 players each 3rd LVL. Create it in the following way:

[Name, if not given by creator]
[Size] [Type, like construct/humanoid/aberration and etc.] [Alignment neutral/good/lawful/evil and etc.]
Hit Points: [Hit points] (combination of dices to get the near value of hit points, e.g. 22d10 + 110)
Speed: [Speed in feet]ft.
Characteristics (modifiers round to the least):
STR ([Strength, from 1 to 30], [+-][modifier of Strength, which is (Strength - 10 )/ 2]
DEX ([Dexterity, from 1 to 30], [+-][modifier of Dexterity, (Dexterity - 10)/2]
CON ([Constitution, from 1 to 30], [+-][modifier of Constitution, (Constitution - 10)/2]
INT ([Intellect, from 1 to 30], [+-][modifier of Intellect, (Intellect - 10)/2]
WIS (Wisdom, from 1 to 30], [+-][modifier of Wisdom, (Wisdom - 10)/2]
CHA (Charisma, from 1 to 30], [+-][Modificator of Charisma, (Charisma- 10)/2]
General skills:
Saving Throws: [For example, Con +11, Cha +12, or Int +7, Dex +10 (count modifiers accordingly to the modifiers of the skill + proficiency bonus of the creature according to its challenge level)]
Skills: [For example, Athletics +13, Perception +10, Survival +16 (count modifiers accordingly to the modifiers of the skill + proficiency bonus of the creature according to its challenge level)]
Damage Immunities: [If should have any, write those types of damages to which creature has immunity]
Senses: [If should have any]
Languages: [If should have any]
Challenge: [Level of challenge, for example, 19 (22,000XP)]
-------------------Information about villain----------
[Some short info about what is villain, it is possible origin, and maybe other interesting facts]
----------------------------------------------------------
--------------------Special Abilities--------------------
[Some list of superpowers and a short explanation of what they do and how they work]
----------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------Actions-----------------------
[Some list of actions which creature can do to attack or to defend]
----------------------------------------------------------

Important! - All fields must be filled according to the Dungeons&Dragons rule for the 5th edition. If you don't sure about some field, fill it out how you think it is right, but warn the user what aspects gave you some doubts.

General skills:  
Saving Throws: Int +9, Wis +6, Cha +8

Damage Immunities: Psychic  
Senses: Darkvision 60 ft., Blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), Passive Perception 16  
Languages: Deep Speech, telepathy 120 ft.  
Challenge: 7 (2,900 XP)  
-------------------Information about villain----------  
The Mindflayer Tyrant is a powerful psionic entity that seeks to dominate the minds of all sentient beings. Once a simple mindflayer, it ascended to power through dark rituals, gaining the ability to control multiple minds at once. It resides in a hidden lair filled with thralls and minions, plotting to expand its influence over the realm.  
----------------------------------------------------------  
--------------------Special Abilities--------------------  
- **Mind Control**: As an action, the Mindflayer Tyrant can attempt to dominate a creature within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target obeys the Tyrant's commands.  
- **Psionic Blast**: The Tyrant can unleash a wave of psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw, taking 4d8 psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.  
----------------------------------------------------------  
--------------------------Actions-----------------------  
- **Tentacle Attack**: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.  
- **Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)**: The Mindflayer Tyrant can use its Psionic Blast ability.  
- **Dominate Mind**: The Tyrant can use its Mind Control ability as a bonus action if it has already used its Tentacle Attack on the same turn.
